doc:
Joe Mantell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Mantell 0 Joe Mantell (né Mantel; December 21, 1915 – September 29, 2010) was an American actor of film and television. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role as Angie in the 1955 film Marty, which won the Academy Award for Best Picture. Joe_Mantell ( né_Mantel ; December_21_,_1915 – September_29_,_2010 ) was an_American_actor of film_and_television . He was_nominated for an_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor for his_role as Angie in the_1955_film_Marty , which won the_Academy_Award for Best_Picture .
